com.smjourney.map

Class Direction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smjourney.map.Direction

  • public class Direction
extends java.lang.Object
    Directional angle constants used to manipulate the direction in which an Entity is facing. Includes relative directional constants (ahead, left, right, etc.), absolute directional constants (compass directions), and methods relative to direction calculation.
